entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
